entry.value: (?:\<158\>)?%{SYSLOGTIMESTAMP:syslog_timestamp} %{HOSTNAME:hostname} %{WORD:program} type=%{WORD:type} msg=audit\S+ saddr=\S+ saddr_fam=%{WORD:saddr_fam}( laddr=%{IP:laddr} lport=%{NUMBER:lport})?( path=%{DATA:path})? \}

(?:\<158\>)?%{SYSLOGTIMESTAMP:syslog_timestamp} %{HOSTNAME:hostname} %{WORD:service} type=%{WORD:type} msg=audit\S+ argc=%{NUMBER:argc}( a0=(\")?%{NOTSPACE:a0}(\")?)?( a1=(\")?%{NOTSPACE:a1}(\")?)?( a2=(\")?%{NOTSPACE:a2}(\")?)?( a3=(\")?%{NOTSPACE:a3}(\")?)?( a4=(\")?%{NOTSPACE:a4}(\")?)?( a5=(\")?%{NOTSPACE:a5}(\")?)?

(?:\<158\>)?%{SYSLOGTIMESTAMP:timestamp} %{DATA:hostname} %{WORD:service} type=%{WORD:type} msg=audit\S+ arch=\S+ syscall=%{NUMBER:syscall} success=%{WORD:success} exit=%{NUMBER:exit} a0=\S+ a1=\S+ a2=\S+ a3=\S+ items=%{NUMBER:items} ppid=%{NUMBER:ppid} pid=%{NUMBER:pid} auid=\S+ uid=%{NUMBER:uid} gid=%{NUMBER:gid} euid=%{NUMBER:euid} suid=%{NUMBER:suid} fsuid=%{NUMBER:fsuid} egid=%{NUMBER:egid} sgid=%{NUMBER:sgid} fsgid=%{NUMBER:fsgid} tty=%{DATA:tty} ses=\S+ comm=\"%{DATA:comm}\" exe=\"%{DATA:exe}\" subj=%{DATA:subj} (?:key=\"%{DATA:key}\")?.*ARCH=\S+ SYSCALL=%{DATA:syscall2} AUID=\"%{DATA:auid2}\" UID=\"%{DATA:uid2}\" GID=\"%{DATA:gid2}\" EUID=\"%{DATA:euid2}\" SUID=\"%{DATA:suid2}\" FSUID=\"%{DATA:fsuid2}\" EGID=\"%{DATA:egid2}\" SGID=\"%{DATA:sgid2}\" FSGID=\"%{DATA:fsgid2}\"

(?:\<158\>)?%{SYSLOGTIMESTAMP:syslog_timestamp} %{HOSTNAME:hostname} %{WORD:service} type=%{WORD:type} msg=audit\S+ item=%{NUMBER:num} name=\"%{DATA:name}\" inode=%{NUMBER:inode} dev=%{DATA:dev} mode=%{NUMBER:mode} ouid=%{NUMBER:ouid} ogid=%{NUMBER:ogid} rdev=%{DATA:rdev} nametype=%{WORD:nametype} cap_fp=%{NUMBER:cap_fp} cap_fi=%{NUMBER:cap_fi} cap_fe=%{NUMBER:cap_fe} cap_fver=%{NUMBER:cap_fver} cap_frootid=%{NUMBER:cap_frootid}.*OUID=\"%{WORD:ouid2}\" OGID=\"%{WORD:ogid2}\"

labels.label: Enva a destino 514 UDP y fin
Se vuelve al formato original de Auditd
Using grok to give a new json format
Send to Azure Storage changing from syslog to json

entry.value: SELECT hostname, program, type, saddr_fam, laddr, lport, path, COUNT(*) FROM FLOWFILE WHERE type = 'SOCKADDR' GROUP BY hostname, program, type, saddr_fam, laddr, lport, path

entry.value: <13>1 ${now():format("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX")} ${hostname} ${service} - ID47 [exampleSDID@32473 iut="3" eventSource="Application" eventID="1011"] ${service}: ${type}, syscall=${syscall}, success=${success}, exit=${exit}, items=${items}, ppid=${ppid}, pid=${pid}, uid=${uid}, gid=${gid}, euid=${euid}, suid=${suid}, fsuid=${fsuid}, egid=${egid}, sgid=${sgid}, fsgid=${fsgid}, tty=${tty}, comm=${comm}, exe=${exe}, subj=${subj}, key=${key}, syscall2=${syscall2}, auid2=${auid2}, uid2=${uid2}, gid2=${gid2}, euid2=${euid2}, suid2=${suid2}, fsuid2=${fsuid2}, egid2=${egid2}, sgid2=${sgid2}, fsgid2=${fsgid2}, count=${count}

<141>${syslog_date} $1 $2 type=$3 syscall=$4 success=$5 exit=$6 items=$7 ppid=$8 pid=$9 uid=$10 gid=$11 euid=$12 suid=$13 fsuid=$14 egid=$15 sgid=$16 fsgid=$17 tty=$18 comm="$19" exe="$20" subj=$21 key="$22" SYSCALL=$23 AUID="$24" UID="$25" GID="$26" EUID="$27" SUID="$28" FSUID="$29" EGID="$30" SGID="$31" FSGID="$32" count=$33

SELECT hostname, service, type, num, name, inode, dev, mode, ouid, ogid, rdev, nametype, cap_fp, cap_fi, cap_fe, cap_fver, cap_frootid, ouid2, ogid2, COUNT(*) FROM FLOWFILE WHERE type = 'PATH' GROUP BY hostname, service, type, num, name, inode, dev, mode, ouid, ogid, rdev, nametype, cap_fp, cap_fi, cap_fe, cap_fver, cap_frootid, ouid2, ogid2

<141>${syslog_date} $1 $2 type=$3 syscall=$4 success=$5 exit=$6 items=$7 ppid=$8 pid=$9 uid=$10 gid=$11 euid=$12 suid=$13 fsuid=$14 egid=$15 sgid=$16 fsgid=$17 tty=$18 comm="$19" exe="$20" subj=$21 key="$22" SYSCALL=$23 AUID="$24" UID="$25" GID="$26" EUID="$27" SUID="$28" FSUID="$29" EGID="$30" SGID="$31" FSGID="$32" count=$33

hostname: $.hostname service: $.service type: $.type syscall: $.syscall success: $.success exit: $.exit items: $.items ppid: $.ppid pid: $.pid uid: $.uid gid: $.gid euid: $.euid suid: $.suid fsuid: $.fsuid egid: $.egid sgid: $.sgid fsgid: $.fsgid tty: $.tty comm: $.comm exe: $.exe subj: $.subj key: $.key syscall2: $.syscall2 auid2: $.auid2 uid2: $.uid2 gid2: $.gid2 euid2: $.euid2 suid2: $.suid2 fsuid2: $.fsuid2 egid2: $.egid2 sgid2: $.sgid2 fsgid2: $.fsgid2 count: $.count

SELECT hostname, service, type, syscall, success, exit, items, ppid, pid, uid, gid, euid, suid, fsuid, egid, sgid, fsgid, tty, comm, exe, subj, key, syscall2, auid2, uid2, gid2, euid2, suid2, fsuid2, egid2, sgid2, fsgid2, COUNT(*) FROM FLOWFILE WHERE type = 'SYSCALL' GROUP BY hostname, service, type, syscall, success, exit, items, ppid, pid, uid, gid, euid, suid, fsuid, egid, sgid, fsgid, tty, comm, exe, subj, key, syscall2, auid2, uid2, gid2, euid2, suid2, fsuid2, egid2, sgid2, fsgid2

<141>${syslog_date} $1 $2 type=$3 syscall=$4 success=$5 exit=$6 items=$7 ppid=$8 pid=$9 uid=$10 gid=$11 euid=$12 suid=$13 fsuid=$14 egid=$15 sgid=$16 fsgid=$17 tty=$18 comm="$19" exe="$20" subj=$21 key="$22" SYSCALL=$23 AUID="$24" UID="$25" GID="$26" EUID="$27" SUID="$28" FSUID="$29" EGID="$30" SGID="$31" FSGID="$32" count=$33
SELECT hostname, service, type, argc, a0, a1, COUNT(*) FROM FLOWFILE WHERE type = 'EXECVE' GROUP BY hostname, service, type, argc, a0, a1
